description: The Bridger Bowl Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Bridger Bowl for the snow report
Alexa, ask Bridger Bowl for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Bridger Bowl
shortDescription: The Bridger Bowl Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Bridger Bowl.
